mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT M.PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NICK , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS CREATE_DT, BOARD_CODE, B.BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, B.READ_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT")AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOOKMARK BM JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_ID = BM.MEMBER_ID ) JOIN BOARD B ON (B.BOARD_NO = BM.BOARD_NO ) JOIN BOARD_GENERAL G ON(G.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BOARD_GENERAL BG WHERE B.BOARD_NO = BG.BOARD_NO) ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT CMPN_LOGO, CMPN_NM, EXPR_PERIOD, EMPL_TYPE, CMPN_ADDR FROM BOOKMARK BM JOIN COMPANY C ON (C.MEMBER_ID = BM.MEMBER_ID) JOIN BOARD_RECRUIT BR ON (BM.BOARD_NO = BR.BOARD_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BOARD_RECRUIT BR WHERE BM.BOARD_NO = BR.BOARD_NO)

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, BOARD_CODE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM "BOARD" B
JOIN BOARD_GENERAL G ON(G.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO)
WHERE DELETED_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
